text: "Army of the Night" is a song by the German power metal group Powerwolf released on 8 May 2015. It was a first single released from the album Blessed & Possessed. After the single's release the band stated that: The music video was released on YouTube on 25 June 2015. It was recorded in St. Joseph Church in Prudnik, Poland. In 2018 the song got covered by Swedish band Amaranthe.
